entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
